data.title: Who Is Deborah Mays Namath?
data.meta_description: Joe Namath's wife is Deborah Mays Namath. Deborah is a former Miss Alabama USA and was crowned Miss Congeniality at the 1985 Miss USA pageant. She is also worked as an actress and television host. Joe and Deborah were married in 1984 and have two children together, Jessica and Olivia.

Joe Namath's wife is Deborah Mays Namath.

Deborah is a former Miss Alabama USA and was crowned Miss Congeniality at the 1985 Miss USA pageant. She is also worked as an actress and television host.

Joe and Deborah were married in 1984 and have two children together, Jessica and Olivia.

Deborah is a strong supporter of her husband's career and is often seen at his games and events.
